description: Try our easy to follow Gingerbread Bunting recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gingerbread Bunting Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roll out dough on a lightly floured surface until 5mm thick. Cut into gingerbread figures. Use a skewer to make a hole so they can be strung together. Transfer to trays and bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Cool completely before decorating with icing. Once set, loop the gingerbread bunting together with bright ribbon. Note: For an even golden colour, switch position of trays in oven halfway through cooking.
